Play.PlayDescription: (:23) T.Brady kneels to NE 13 for -1 yards. Patriots 11th consecutive division title, extends record for most consecutive division titles since 1970 (Rams 7). Patriots 16th consecutive win vs. Bills, t-3rd longest NFL win streak vs. single opponent. Patriots 13th 12-win season since merger, t-most all-time (SF). NE 12-Brady 32nd career win vs. Bills, extends NFL record for wins vs. single opponent.
Play.PlayDescriptionWithJerseyNumbers: (:23) 12-T.Brady kneels to NE 13 for -1 yards. Patriots 11th consecutive division title, extends record for most consecutive division titles since 1970 (Rams 7). Patriots 16th consecutive win vs. Bills, t-3rd longest NFL win streak vs. single opponent. Patriots 13th 12-win season since merger, t-most all-time (SF). NE 12-Brady 32nd career win vs. Bills, extends NFL record for wins vs. single opponent.

Play.PlayDescription: END GAME
Play.PlayDescriptionWithJerseyNumbers: END GAME
